00144 void LinearClassifier::reset( )
00145 {
00146     modifiedM    = true;
00147     dimM         = 0;
00148     outDimM      = 0;
00149     usedClassesM = 0;
00150     countM       = 0;
00151     classCountM  = 0U;
00152     meanM        = 0.;
00153     covarM       = 0.;
00154 }

00157 //===========================================================================
00191 void LinearClassifier::train
00192 (
00193     const Array< double >& v,
00194     unsigned m
00195 )
00196 {
00197     // Array must be a vector:
00198     SIZE_CHECK( v.ndim( ) == 1 )
00199 
00200     unsigned c;
00201 
00202 
00203     // Dimension of training vector must be equal to the number
00204     // of attributes used for classification:   
00205     if ( dimM != v.dim( 0 ) )
00206     {
00207         if ( countM > 0 )
00208         {
00209             // Not the first training vector, so this is definitely
00210             // an error:
00211             throw 1;
00212         }
00213         else
00214         {
00215             // This is the first training vector, so adapt
00216             // internal data structures to its size:
00217             dimM   = v.dim( 0 );
00218             meanM .resize( dimM );
00219             covarM.resize( dimM, dimM );
00220             meanM  = 0.;
00221             covarM = 0.;
00222         }
00223     }   
00224 
00225     // If the class of the training vector exceeds the number
00226     // of known classes, space for new classes is created:
00227     if ( m >= classCountM.nelem( ) )
00228     {
00229         unsigned newSizeL = classCountM.nelem( ) + classIncrC;
00230         classCountM.resize( newSizeL, true );
00231         classAbsM  .resize( newSizeL, true );
00232         classRelM  .resize( newSizeL, true );
00233         classMeanM .resize( newSizeL, true );
00234         transMeanM .resize( newSizeL, true );
00235 
00236          for( unsigned int i = classCountM.nelem( )-1;
00237              i >= classCountM.nelem( ) - classIncrC;
00238              i-- )
00239           classCountM( i ) = 0;
00240     }
00241 
00242   
00243 
00244     // Does the training vector belongs to a class
00245     // unknown before?
00246     if ( classCountM( m ) == 0 )
00247     {
00248         // New class, so assign a new save index
00249         // for this class and update internal variables: 
00250         c = usedClassesM++;
00251 
00252         classAbsM( c ) = m;
00253         classRelM( m ) = c;
00254 
00255         classMeanM( c ).resize( dimM );
00256         classMeanM( c ) = 0.;
00257     }
00258     else
00259     {
00260         // Class is already known, determine save index:
00261         c = classRelM( m );
00262     }
00263 
00264     // Update training vectors and class members counter:
00265     ++countM;
00266     ++classCountM( m );
00267 
00268 
00269     Array< double >& classMeanL = classMeanM( c );
00270     for ( unsigned i = 0; i < dimM; ++i )
00271     {
00272         double t = v( i );
00273         classMeanL( i ) += t;
00274         meanM     ( i ) += t;
00275 
00276         for ( unsigned j = 0; j <= i; ++j )
00277         {
00278             covarM( i, j ) += v( j ) * t;
00279         }
00280     }
00281 
00282     // The values on which the classificator is based was
00283     // modified, so the classificator needs an update:
00284     modifiedM = true;
00285 }

00319 void LinearClassifier::train
00320 (
00321         const Array< double >& vectorsA,
00322         const Array< unsigned >& classNumsA
00323 )
00324 {
00325         SIZE_CHECK
00326         (
00327                 vectorsA  .ndim( ) == 2 &&
00328                 classNumsA.ndim( ) == 1 &&
00329                 classNumsA.dim( 0 ) == vectorsA.dim( 0 )
00330         )
00331 
00332     for( unsigned i = 0; i < vectorsA.dim( 0 ); ++i )
00333         {
00334                 train( vectorsA[ i ], classNumsA( i ) );
00335         }
00336 }

00339 //===========================================================================
00363 unsigned LinearClassifier::classify
00364 (
00365         const Array< double >& v
00366 )
00367 {
00368     double     d, t;
00369     double     dist = -1;
00370     unsigned   c, i, j, m = 0;
00371 
00372     if( usedClassesM == 1 )
00373         {
00374         m = classAbsM( 0 );
00375         }
00376     else if( dimM && usedClassesM >= 2)
00377     {
00378                 update( );
00379 
00380                 Array< double > dvecL( outDimM );
00381 
00382                 //
00383                 // Lc->d = Lc->TransMat * v
00384                 //
00385                 for( i = outDimM; i--; )
00386                 {
00387                         t = 0.;
00388 
00389                         for( j = dimM; j--; )
00390                         {
00391                                 t += transMatM( i, j ) * v( j );
00392                         }
00393 
00394                         dvecL( i ) = t;
00395                 }
00396 
00397 
00398                 distVecM.resize( usedClassesM );
00399 
00400                 for( c = usedClassesM; c--; )
00401                 {
00402                         //
00403                         // Abstand zu Klasse 'c'
00404                         //
00405                         d = sqrDistance( dvecL, transMeanM( c ) );
00406 
00407                         //
00408                         // Abstand kuerzer ?
00409                         //
00410                         if( dist < 0 || d < dist )
00411                         {
00412                                 dist  = d;
00413                                 m     = classAbsM( c );
00414                         }
00415 
00416                         //
00417                         // Abstandsquadrate speichern
00418                         //
00419                         distVecM( c ) = d;
00420                 }
00421     }
00422 
00423     return m;
00424 }

00454 void LinearClassifier::classify
00455 (
00456         const Array< double >& vectorsA,
00457         Array< unsigned >& classNumsA
00458 )
00459 {
00460         SIZE_CHECK( vectorsA.ndim( ) == 2 )
00461 
00462     if( dimM == 0 || countM == 0 )
00463         {
00464                 throw 1;
00465         }
00466 
00467         classNumsA.resize( vectorsA.dim( 0 ) );
00468 
00469         for( unsigned i = 0; i < vectorsA.dim( 0 ); ++i )
00470         {
00471                 classNumsA( i ) = classify( vectorsA[ i ] );
00472         }
00473 }

00523 unsigned LinearClassifier::leaveOneOut
00524 (
00525         const Array< double >& v,
00526         unsigned m
00527 )
00528 {
00529         SIZE_CHECK
00530         (
00531                 v.ndim( ) == 1 &&
00532                 v.dim( 0 ) == dimM &&
00533                 m < classCountM.nelem( ) &&
00534                 classCountM( m ) > 0
00535         )
00536 
00537     unsigned  i, j, c, cn;
00538     double    t;
00539 
00540         //
00541         // relative Klassennummer holen
00542         //
00543         c = classRelM( m );
00544 
00545         //
00546         // Vektor aus dem Trainingssatz nehmen
00547         //
00548         --countM;
00549         --classCountM( m );
00550 
00551         Array< double >& classMeanL = classMeanM( c );
00552         for( i = 0; i < dimM; ++i )
00553         {
00554                 t = v( i );
00555                 classMeanL( i ) -= t;
00556                 meanM     ( i ) -= t;
00557 
00558                 for( j = 0; j <= i; ++j )
00559                 {
00560                         covarM( i, j ) -= v( j ) * t;
00561                 }
00562         }
00563 
00564         modifiedM = true;
00565         cn = classify( v );
00566 
00567         //
00568         // Vektor wieder zum Trainingssatz hinzufuegen
00569         //
00570         ++countM;
00571         ++classCountM( m );
00572 
00573         for( i = 0; i < dimM; ++i )
00574         {
00575                 t = v( i );
00576                 classMeanL( i ) += t;
00577                 meanM     ( i ) += t;
00578 
00579                 for( j = 0; j <= i; ++j )
00580                 {
00581                         covarM( i, j ) += v( j ) * t;
00582                 }
00583         }
00584 
00585         modifiedM = true;
00586 
00587         return cn;
00588 }

00622 void LinearClassifier::leaveOneOut
00623 (
00624         const Array< double >& vectorsA,
00625         const Array< unsigned >& classNumsA,
00626         Array< unsigned >& resultNumsA
00627 )
00628 {
00629         SIZE_CHECK
00630         (
00631                 vectorsA.ndim( ) == 2 &&
00632                 classNumsA.ndim( ) == 1 &&
00633                 vectorsA.dim( 0 ) == classNumsA.dim( 0 )
00634         )
00635 
00636     if( dimM == 0 || countM == 0 )
00637         {
00638                 throw 1;
00639         }
00640 
00641         resultNumsA.resize( vectorsA.dim( 0 ) );
00642 
00643         for( unsigned i = 0; i < vectorsA.dim( 0 ); ++i )
00644         {
00645                 resultNumsA( i ) = leaveOneOut( vectorsA[ i ], classNumsA( i ) );
00646         }
00647 }

00650 //===========================================================================
00675 void LinearClassifier::update( )
00676 {
00677     unsigned  i, j, c;
00678     double    cnt, t;
00679 
00680     if( modifiedM && dimM > 0 && usedClassesM >= 2 )
00681     {
00682                 Array2D< double > betweenCovarL( dimM, dimM );
00683                 Array2D< double > withinCovarL ( dimM, dimM );
00684                 Array  < double > dvecL( dimM );
00685 
00686         //
00687         // Berechnung von B und W
00688         //
00689         for( i = 0; i < dimM; ++i )
00690                 {
00691             for (j = 0; j <= i; j++)
00692                         {
00693                 betweenCovarL( i, j ) = 0.;
00694                         }
00695                 }
00696 
00697         for( c = usedClassesM; c--; )
00698                 {
00699                         //
00700                         // Anzahl fuer absolute Klassennummer holen
00701                         //
00702                         cnt = double( classCountM( classAbsM( c ) ) );
00703                         Array< double >& classMeanL = classMeanM( c );
00704                         for( i = 0; i < dimM; ++i )
00705                         {
00706                                 t = classMeanL( i ) / cnt;
00707 
00708                                 for( j = 0; j <= i; ++j )
00709                                 {
00710                                         betweenCovarL( i, j ) += classMeanL( j ) * t;
00711                                 }
00712                         }
00713                 }
00714 
00715         for( i = 0; i < dimM; ++i )
00716         {
00717             t = meanM( i ) / countM;
00718 
00719             for( j = 0; j <= i; ++j )
00720             {
00721                 withinCovarL ( i, j )  = covarM( i, j ) - betweenCovarL( i, j );
00722                 betweenCovarL( i, j ) -= meanM( j ) * t;
00723             }
00724                 }
00725 
00726                 // normalization necessary?
00727         for( i = 0; i < dimM; ++i )
00728                 {
00729             for( j = 0; j <= i; ++j )
00730             {
00731                 withinCovarL ( i, j ) /= countM;
00732                 betweenCovarL( i, j ) /= countM;
00733             }
00734                 }
00735 
00736                 outDimM = dimM < usedClassesM - 1 ? dimM : usedClassesM - 1;
00737 
00738         discrimAnalysis
00739                 (
00740                         betweenCovarL,
00741                         withinCovarL,
00742                         transMatM,
00743                         dvecL,
00744             outDimM
00745                 );
00746 
00747         //
00748         // transformierte Klassenvektoren vorberechnen
00749         //
00750         for( c = usedClassesM; c--; )
00751                 {
00752                         Array< double >& classMeanL = classMeanM( c );
00753                         Array< double >& transMeanL = transMeanM( c );
00754                         transMeanL.resize( outDimM );
00755 
00756                         //
00757                         // Anzahl fuer absolute Klassennummer holen
00758                         //
00759                         cnt = double( classCountM( classAbsM( c ) ) );
00760 
00761                         for( i = outDimM; i--; )
00762                         {
00763                                 t = 0.0;
00764 
00765                                 for( j = dimM; j--; )
00766                                 {
00767                                         t += transMatM( i, j ) * classMeanL( j );
00768                                 }
00769 
00770                                 transMeanL( i ) = t / cnt;
00771                         }
00772                 }
00773 
00774         modifiedM = false;
00775     }
00776 }
